description: Five of the victims are believed to be Czechs on a walking trip, the sixth is a police officer.
title: Avalanches in Austrian Alps kill at least six
title_page: Avalanches in Austrian Alps kill at least six - BBC News
maintext: In response to the avalanche in the Dachstein mountain range, seven helicopters were used to transport some 100 rescuers to the site to help search for those missing, the head of operations for the local mountain rescue team, Heribert Eisl, said.
